SEARCH
Package model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
GuessButtonActionListener, NewGameButtonActionListener, Serializable, EventListener
public class Game extends Object implements GuessButtonActionListener, NewGameButtonActionListener, Serializable
This class represents the game logic and user interface for the Hangman game. It handles actions related to guessing letters and starting new games, and it manages the game's state, including saving and loading the state.
See Also:
